articles.title: Millions of Americans face 'life-threatening' winter weather as Arctic blast grips the nation - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Millions of Americans  face 'life-threatening' winter weather as Arctic blast grips the nation
articles.content: Along with causing severe winds and heavy precipitation over a significant portion of the US, the Arctic blast has also interfered with transport, power supplies, and outdoor activities. With at leas… [+232 chars]
